newsitem.title: USA: Pall Corp says sues HemaSure.
newsitem.headline: Pall Corp says sues HemaSure.

text.p: Pall Corp said Monday it has filed a new lawsuit against HemaSure Inc, accusing the company of patent infringement.
The lawsuit contends that HemaSure's leukocyte-reducing blood filters violate two U.S. patents covering Pall's nylon membrane and its leukocyte-reducing filter medium.
In February, Pall sued HemaSure, accusing the Marlborough, Mass.-based company of infringing Pall's U.S. patent for venting and air management of blood filters.
Pall designs, manufactures and markets disposable filters, membranes and other fluid clarification and separation devices for the health care, aeropower and fluid-processing markets.
Neither Pall nor HemaSure could be immediately reached for comment.
